overview_summary: Both profiled neighbors have no documented stance on the development (2 unknown out of 2). Neither individual holds a public office or notable leadership role, indicating no high-influence neighbors; both appear to be private landowners with limited formal community influence.

neighbors.name: Douglas Watson Jr.
